name: Monitor
description: It is used to display images, text, video, and graphics information generated by a connected computer via a computer's video card.

name: Keyboard
description: A keyboard is for putting information including letters, words and numbers into your computer.

name: Motherboard
description: Motherboard is the main printed circuit board (PCB) in a computer.

name: Hard Drive
description: Hard disks are flat circular plates made of aluminum or glass and coated with a magnetic material.

name: Mouse
description: Mouse is a small handheld input device that controls a computer screen's cursor or pointer in conjunction with the way it is moved on a flat surface.

name: RAM
description: RAM is the main memory in a computer.
